title: Brightness of bulb as magnetic field varies

content.question: A circuit containing only a lightbulb is placed in a uniform magnetic field \(\overrightarrow{B}\)Â directed into the page, as shown above on the left. The variation of the magnetic field as a function of time is shown in the graph. During which of the following intervals will the bulb be brightest?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
